text:
Bernard Lavalette (20 January 1926 – 14 December 2019) was a French actor, singer and comedian. He was born in Paris. Lavalette was best known for his roles in "The Bureaucrats" (1959), "Heaven Sent" (1963), "Thomas the Impostor" (1964), "Le gendarme se marie" (1968) and "The Apprentice Heel" (1977).
Lavalette died on 14 December 2019 in Paris at the age of 93.
